game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Legends speak of a powerful relic hidden within the forgotten city. Retrieve it and unlock its secrets.
game.reward: Golden Chalice, 1000 experience points, and increased reputation with the Explorer's Guild

tasks.description: Speak to locals and gather rumors about the lost city.

tasks.objective: Explore the nearby forest for any signs of Eldarath
tasks.description: Search for ancient ruins, strange markings, or hidden paths.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the heart of Eldarath
tasks.description: Overcome treacherous puzzles and deadly creatures to reach the relic.
